sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The heads of Armenia and Azerbaijan meet in Brussels as tensions in Nagorno-Karabakh continue to rise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: South Korea's president travels to Ukraine for a surprise visit, while fighters from the Wagner mercenary group are seen entering Belarus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The heads of Armenia and Azerbaijan have met for talks mediated by European Council President Charles Michel in Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This comes amidst rising tensions in Nagorno-Karabakh, causing observers to fear a worsening humanitarian crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On the top of the agenda, recent clashes and the closure of the only road that links Armenia and Nagorno-Karabakh.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We are going through one of the most comprehensive and vigorous stages of negotiations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And even though our meeting took place in the context of a growing increase in tensions on the ground, I noted an important momentum in the political discussions and efforts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Michel also announced his intention to invite Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan and Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev for further talks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia, which previously oversaw the peace talks after the 2020 war that killed more than 6,000 people, also called for a summit in Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: South Korea's President, Yang Sung-yeol, traveled to Ukraine on Saturday for a surprise visit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At the start of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, Seoul joined international sanctions against Moscow and has since provided Kyiv with humanitarian and financial support.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But it hasn't provided weapons. I can happily state that a agreement is already being made on the transfer of transport and equipment of special purpose, including machines for demining.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This helps us save people's lives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile Ukraine's border guards have confirmed that fighters from the Wagner mercenary group have entered Belarus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Belarus' defense ministry has previously said that fighters from the group are training group have entered Belarus. Belarus' defense ministry has previously said that fighters from the group are training the country's soldiers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And on Saturday, at least 60 trucks, buses, and other large vehicles reportedly crossed the border via Russia, accompanied by police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some 500 people have been evacuated from the Spanish island of La Palma

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: as a wildfire burned through 140 hectares of land.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's the worst natural disaster in the area since a volcanic eruption in 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The blaze has already damaged at least 50 homes, according to authorities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Another 500 people could also be forced to evacuate in the coming hours as the fire advances.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some 150 firefighters have been deployed to help local crews battle the blaze.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Marketa Vondrusova has become the first unseated woman to win Wimbledon, coming back in each set for 6-4, 6-4 victory over 2022 runner-up Aung Zubor in the final.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After being sidelined from April to October, she finished last season ranked just 99th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: She then arrived at Wimbledon 42nd and was the first unseeded woman to reach the final in 60 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Her opponent Tunisia's Jebeur is the only Arab woman and only North African woman to make it that far in singles at any Grand Slam tournament.
